emuInput.TitMainTitle: Glass door for the Department of Parks and Recreation - Robert J. Templeton Director Bureau of Recreational Activities - Allen E. Risedorph Superintendent, City County Building, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText:
Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 28, 1961, pg. 3 reads: " Some Cracked by Negro Job-seekers...Others Closed...8 full-time Negro workers out of over 200 political appointees. "
Cutline of article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 28, 1961, pg. 3 reads: "Branch Rickey Will Direct Job Probe - The Commission on Human Relations, this week, accepted the request of Mayor Joseph M. Barr and agreed to make a study of the city government's employment and promotion procedures and practices."
